Why you should book your glow wih me

If you have ever had a booth tan, and if you are anything like me, you might also just find it stressful. First of all, where do you stand? How do you position yourself? Do you need to hold your breath for the entire time? How long is it going to take? When you get a custom airbrushed tan by a technician like myself, I can tell you where to stand, what to do, when to hold your breath. I can control the color so it goes on evenly over your entire body and your tan is going to dry more quickly because of this. I guarentee the perfect glow, and I promise it will last longer and be more cost effefective than a booth tan anyday!
